entry.title: 3/17 - Far and Wide National Juried Exhibition
entry.content:
Woodstock Artists Association & Museum
üìç Woodstock, NY, United States
üé® All Visual Arts
üìÖ 03/17/2019 deadline
üí∞ $35.00 fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

Open to all artists living and working in the United States.
Online applications only.

Juror: Kimberly Camp, former President and CEO of the Barnes Foundation


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Artists are invited to submit up to 5 works that are innovative in form and content or that have been created within the parameters of traditional genres but nevertheless break new ground.

Exhibition Dates: May 11 - June 9
Artists Reception: Saturday, May 18, 4-6pm

Awards
- The Arthur Harris Best in Show Award ($500)
- Nicholas Buhalis Award for Artistic Excellence in Abstract/Figurative or Figurative Work ($500)

Media & Size Limitations:
Works in the following media will be considered:
Painting
Drawing
Original Prints (Traditional and digital. No reproductions of works existing in other media.)
Photography
Sculpture

2-D works should not exceed 36 inches on the longest dimension (38 inches including frame).
3-D work must be no greater than 36 x 36 x 36 inches
